entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4 except zero near the Alberta border. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4 except zero near the Alberta border. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near noon. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
